articles.author: Irie Sentner
articles.title: American business titans greet Trump in Saudi Arabia - Politico
articles.description: Nearly three dozen American business leaders, invited by the Saudis, flew thousands of miles to attend the president’s state visit.
articles.content: It is emblematic of both how foreign governments try to lobby this president because of his business interests in their countries, and how the private sector has bent the knee, said Donald Sherman, e… [+6516 chars]
